EmailTemplate.name: 17.Radio.AirScale.AirScal.L.G.N.17206.AirScale 2017.Email 4 - Zero Emission
EmailTemplate.subject: Call a halt to spiraling energy bills
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
${preheader} View as web page <[[{{system.viewAsWebpageLink}}]]> Stop spiraling energy bills Take action now to reduce your energy bills In 2016, the world’s base stations consumed 8 percent more energy on average than in 2015. With revenue flat, these costs are eating into operator profitability.
The solution? Upgrade to Nokia AirScale Base Stations, which use 60 percent less energy than legacy infrastructure. Connect with us © {{my.CopyrightYear}} Nokia. Karaportti 3, 02610 Espoo, Finland Contact us <[[{{my.ContactUs}}]]> | Privacy policy <[[{{my.PrivacyPolicy}}]]> | Unsubscribe <[[{{system.unsubscribeLink}}]]> This message has been sent to you because of your relationship with Nokia Networks or its third party licensors who are trusted partners of Nokia.
